task.title: Create webhook for TestOps - Jira integration

li.p: You must be the Owner or Administrator of your organization

taskbody.context: We use Jira webhook to notify Katalon Platform when specific events happen in Jira. For instance, Jira can alert Defect Reports when a defect-linked Jira issue's status or priority is updated. By using a webhook, Jira issue lifecycle changes can be reflected on Katalon Platform in real-time without any manual intervention from users. This allows for seamless and efficient coordination between Jira and Katalon Platform, providing users with up-to-date information without any delay.

step.cmd: On , go to ConfigurationsIntegrationsJira/Xray, scroll down to Webhook.
step.info: If you don't see the Webhook section, set up Jira integration first. Jira webhook integration

step.cmd: Select Create Webhook, and copy the Webhook URL.Copy jira webhook URL
Open your Jira portal, go to Jira SettingsWebhookCreate a Webhook. Paste the Webhook URL from to the URL field. Paste jira webhook URL
Set up Jira events scope for the Webhook by selecting Issue: created, updated, deleted. Select jira webhook scopes
step.info: Uncheck the Exclude Body option: uncheck Exclude body optionFinally, select Create at the bottom of the screen.

taskbody.result: The Jira Webhook is created successfully. Jira webhook created successfully
